name: Tyrannosaurus Rex
description: Tyrannosaurus Rex, often abbreviated to T. rex, was one of the largest land carnivores of all time. It had a massive skull balanced by a long, heavy tail.

name: Triceratops
description: Triceratops was a large herbivorous dinosaur known for its three distinct facial horns and large bony frill at the back of its head.

name: Stegosaurus
description: Stegosaurus is easily recognized by the distinctive double row of kite-shaped plates rising vertically along its arched back and the two pairs of long spikes extending horizontally near the end of its tail.

name: Velociraptor
description: Velociraptor was a small, fast, and agile carnivorous dinosaur, known for its sharp claws and believed to have been covered in feathers.

name: Brachiosaurus
description: Brachiosaurus was a massive herbivorous dinosaur with long neck and forelimbs, allowing it to reach high vegetation, unlike most other sauropods.

name: Spinosaurus
description: Spinosaurus was one of the largest carnivorous dinosaurs, easily identified by its distinctive sail-like structure formed by elongated spines on its back.

name: Ankylosaurus
description: Ankylosaurus was a heavily armored herbivorous dinosaur with a large club-like structure at the end of its tail, used for defense against predators.

name: Allosaurus
description: Allosaurus was a large carnivorous dinosaur known for its powerful jaws filled with sharp teeth, making it one of the top predators of its time.

name: Diplodocus
description: Diplodocus was a long-necked, whip-tailed giant and one of the longest dinosaurs known, with a distinctive row of spines along its back.

name: Iguanodon
description: Iguanodon was a large herbivorous dinosaur that could walk on both two and four legs and is known for its large thumb spikes, which were likely used for defense.
